std_narrative.citation:
Catharina (age 67 Jaar) died on 18 November 1940 and was buried on 19 November 1940. '''Burial''': "eGGSA Burial, Cremation and Death Registers, Catharina Wilhemena Jacoba Aling"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Stellenbosch, Western Cape, burial register, 1918-1946, page 131, page . Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G2 8/4. Transcribed by Ockert and Sasa Malan
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBurials.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Surname: Aling, First Name: catharina in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
